snippet: Marcus Mabry, Rendezvous’s editor, talks with Shannon O’Neil of the Council of Foreign Relations about the ramifications of Hugo Chávez’s death on Venezuela, Latin America and the world.
abstract: Marcus Mabry, Rendezvous’s editor, talks with Shannon O’Neil of the Council of Foreign Relations about the ramifications of Hugo Chávez’s death on Venezuela, Latin America and the world.

headline.main: Venezuela After the Death of Chávez
